July 16, 1932 D Murton Colliery Contest
Murton Colliery Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
murton-colliery-contest
None
Beautiful Britain
Cricket Field, Murton, County Durham Prizes - 1st £7 and cup, 2nd £4, 3rd £3, 4th £2, 5th £1. March contest - 1st(£1) Wheatley Hill Colliery, 2nd(10s.) Craghead Colliery. 5 bands competed.
Sept. 1, 2013, 1:54 p.m. Dec. 9, 2016, 10:30 a.m.
1 Wheatley Hill Colliery William Straughan
2 Reg Vardy Band A. Smith
3 St Hilda Colliery (New) W. Farrall
4 Darlington Forge G. C. Cooper
5 Dawdon Lodge Unknown
